description: hgignore: ignoring *.rawhtml files generated by doc/Makefile

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

On 2012/03/14 02:09:40, rsc wrote:
> I think I'd rather just have people run make clean.
> I think it is important that if you run
> 
>     ./all.bash
>     hg status
> 
> that you don't get told about build byproducts, but this
> is not a build byproduct.

I see, makes sense.

I think I'd rather just have people run make clean.
I think it is important that if you run

    ./all.bash
    hg status

that you don't get told about build byproducts, but this
is not a build byproduct.

subject: code review 5819045: hgignore: ignoring *.rawhtml files generated by doc/Makefile
